author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 12, 2020
description: Dr. Bonnie Henry announced 35 new cases on Saturday, bringing British Columbia's total to 1,445.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • 35 new cases of COVID-19 and three more deaths were announced Saturday. 
  • The total number of people who have tested positive in B.C. is now 1,445.
  • 58 people have died.
  • 905 patients have recovered from the illness.<… [+4580 chars]
